00022 #region Usings
00023 using System;
00024 using System.Collections.Generic;
00025 
00026 #endregion
00027 
00028 namespace Utilities.DataTypes.Patterns
00029 {
00035     public class Factory<Key,T>
00036     {
00037         #region Protected Variables
00038 
00042         protected Dictionary<Key, Func<T>> Constructors = new Dictionary<Key, Func<T>>();
00043 
00044         #endregion
00045 
00046         #region Public Functions
00047 
00053         public void Register(Key Key, T Result)
00054         {
00055             try
00056             {
00057                 if (Constructors.ContainsKey(Key))
00058                     Constructors[Key] = new Func<T>(() => Result);
00059                 else
00060                     Constructors.Add(Key, new Func<T>(() => Result));
00061             }
00062             catch { throw; }
00063         }
00064 
00070         public void Register(Key Key, Func<T> Constructor)
00071         {
00072             try
00073             {
00074                 if (Constructors.ContainsKey(Key))
00075                     Constructors[Key] = Constructor;
00076                 else
00077                     Constructors.Add(Key, Constructor);
00078             }
00079             catch { throw; }
00080         }
00081 
00087         public T Create(Key Key)
00088         {
00089             try
00090             {
00091                 if (Constructors.ContainsKey(Key))
00092                     return Constructors[Key]();
00093                 return default(T);
00094             }
00095             catch { throw; }
00096         }
00097 
00098         #endregion
00099     }
00100 }
